00153 #define ONOFF_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00154 { \
00155    .id = ONOFF_CLUSTER_ID, \
00156    .options = \
00157    { \
00158      .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00159      .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00160      .reserved = 0, \
00161    }, \
00162    .attributesAmount = ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00163    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00164    .commandsAmount = ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00165    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00166 }
00167 
00168 #define ONOFF_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00169 { \
00170    .id = ONOFF_CLUSTER_ID, \
00171    .options = \
00172    { \
00173      .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00174      .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00175      .reserved = 0, \
00176    }, \
00177    .attributesAmount = ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00178    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00179    .commandsAmount = ZCL_ONOFF_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00180    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00181 }
00182 
00183 #define DEFINE_ONOFF_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00184     ONOFF_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)

00196 typedef struct PACK
00197 {
00198   struct PACK
00199   {
00200     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00201     uint8_t             type;
00202     uint8_t             properties;
00203     bool                value;
00204     ZCL_ReportTime_t    reportCounter;     
00205     ZCL_ReportTime_t    minReportInterval; 
00206     ZCL_ReportTime_t    maxReportInterval; 
00207     bool                reportableChange;  
00208     ZCL_ReportTime_t    timeoutPeriod;     
00209     bool                lastReportedValue; 
00210   } onOff;
00211 
00212   struct PACK
00213   {
00214     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00215     uint8_t             type;
00216     uint8_t             properties;
00217     bool                value;
00218   } globalSceneControl;
00219 
00220   struct PACK
00221   {
00222     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00223     uint8_t             type;
00224     uint8_t             properties;
00225     uint16_t            value;
00226   } onTime;
00227 
00228   struct PACK
00229   {
00230     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00231     uint8_t             type;
00232     uint8_t             properties;
00233     uint16_t            value;
00234   } offWaitTime;
00235

00297 typedef struct
00298 {
00299   struct
00300   {
00301     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00302     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00303     ZCL_Status_t(*onCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t * payload);
00304   } onCommand;
00305 
00306   struct
00307   {
00308     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00309     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00310     ZCL_Status_t(*offCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t * payload);
00311   } offCommand;
00312 
00313   struct
00314   {
00315     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00316     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00317     ZCL_Status_t(*toggleCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t * payload);
00318   } toggleCommand;
00319 
00320   struct
00321   {
00322     ZCL_CommandId_t id;

00324     ZCL_Status_t(*offWithEffectCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_OffWithEffect_t * payload);
00325   } offWithEffectCommand;
00326

00328   {
00329     ZCL_CommandId_t id;

00332   } onWithRecallGlobalSceneCommand;

00341 } ZCL_OnOffClusterCommands_t;
